label: AB_hR2_160_a_a-002
title: GeTe Structure
comments:
This is a distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_225_a_b-001}{rock salt ($B1$) structure}, and GeTe undergoes a phase transition to the rock salt structure above 300$^{\circ}$C.  When $\alpha = 60^{\circ} (c/a = \sqrt{6})$ and $z_{2}-z_{1} = 1/2$ this becomes the rock salt structure. 
 Space group $R3m$ \#160 does not specify the origin of the $z$-axis. Here we arbitrarily set $z_{1} = 0$. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
